Returns: The claimed milestone. This will be null if the claim operation did not succeed.
The quest owning the claimed milestone. This will be null if the claim operation did not succeed.

ClassDesc: Result delivered when claiming a milestone. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_OK_E@ the milestone was successfully claimed. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MILESTONE_CLAIMED_PREVIOUSLY_E@ if the milestone was previously claimed for this player. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MILESTONE_CLAIM_FAILED_E@ if the milestone is not currently eligible for claiming. Usually, this means that the quest has expired or the local event counts are out of sync with the server. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_NETWORK_ERROR_OPERATION_FAILED_E@ if the network request to claim the milestone fails failed. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@ if an unexpected error occurred in the service.
